LanguageData.AnimalsLearningFactor.label: animals learning factor
LanguageData.AnimalsLearningFactor.description: A multiplier on the learning rate for animals skill.
LanguageData.CaravanRidingSpeedFactor.label: caravan riding speed
LanguageData.CaravanRidingSpeedFactor.description: The multiplier applied to a person's movement speed when they ride this animal as part of a caravan. Animals can only be ridden in caravans.
LanguageData.CarryingCapacity.label: carrying capacity
LanguageData.CarryingCapacity.description: The amount of stuff this creature can carry in its hands, mouth, or other manipulators.\n\nThis is separate from the ability to carry cargo on long cross-world trips.
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMax.label: Maximum comfortable temperature
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMax.description: Above this temperature, characters will be unhappy.\n\nSignificantly above this temperature, they will develop heatstroke and eventually die.
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMin.label: Minimum comfortable temperature
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMin.description: Below this temperature, characters will be unhappy.\n\nSignificantly below this temperature, they will develop hypothermia and frostbite and eventually die.
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.label: eating speed
LanguageData.FilthRate.label: filth rate
LanguageData.FilthRate.description: How much filth this creature produces.\n\nIt's best to keep filth-producing animals outdoors or on straw matting where their filth won't be a problem.
LanguageData.ForagedNutritionPerDay.label: foraged food amount
LanguageData.ForagedNutritionPerDay.description: The amount of nutrition this person will automatically forage per day while traveling by caravan.
LanguageData.GlobalLearningFactor.label: global learning factor
LanguageData.GlobalLearningFactor.description: A multiplier on the learning rate for all skills.
LanguageData.HungerRateMultiplier.label: hunger rate multiplier
LanguageData.HungerRateMultiplier.description: A multiplier on how quickly a creature becomes hungry.
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeed.label: immunity gain speed
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeed.description: The speed at which this character gains immunity to diseases.\n\nIf this is too slow, the character will die from a disease before developing immunity.
LanguageData.InjuryHealingFactor.label: injury healing factor
LanguageData.InjuryHealingFactor.description: The multiplier applied to a person's injury healing rate.
LanguageData.LeatherAmount.label: leather amount
LanguageData.LeatherAmount.description: The amount of leather yielded when butchering this creature. This value is reduced if the creature is not slaughtered cleanly, or if it is wounded when killed.
LanguageData.MeatAmount.label: meat amount
LanguageData.MeatAmount.description: The amount of meat yielded when butchering this creature. This value is reduced if the creature is not slaughtered cleanly, or if it is wounded when killed.
LanguageData.MentalBreakThreshold.label: mental break threshold
LanguageData.MentalBreakThreshold.description: As long as someone's mood is below this level, they are in danger of having a mental break.\n\nThe severity of the mental break will depend on how far below the threshold they are.
LanguageData.MinimumHandlingSkill.label: minimum handling skill
LanguageData.MinimumHandlingSkill.description: This creature cannot be tamed, trained, or commanded by anyone with less than this skill in animals.
LanguageData.MoveSpeed.label: move speed
LanguageData.MoveSpeed.description: Speed of movement in cells per second.
LanguageData.PainShockThreshold.label: pain shock threshold
LanguageData.PainShockThreshold.description: The pain level at which this creature is downed from pain.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.label: psychic sensitivity
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.description: More sensitive people suffer more from negative psychic effects, and benefit more from positive ones. Higher psychic sensitivity also increases neural heat limit.
LanguageData.RestRateMultiplier.label: rest rate multiplier
LanguageData.RestRateMultiplier.description: A multiplier on how quickly a creature rests while sleeping.
LanguageData.ToxicSensitivity.label: toxic sensitivity
LanguageData.ToxicSensitivity.description: Multiplier on the impact of toxic buildup on this creature.
